name: denominationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a particular religious denomination (= a religious group with slightly different beliefs from others that share the same religion): The groups cooperated organizationally on several projects, but they remained denominationally distinct. These flats have always housed a socially and denominationally mixed population.
More examplesFewer examplesWe have become separated politically, denominationally, and otherwise.This common religious ethos is evident even in denominationally diverse audiences. The institution was denominationally specific, catering only for Quaker patients.
